tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was not aware that my pain was due to flat foot.I was recommended a surgery by other doctor and I was worried. Natraj doctor explained the issue and stopped pain killers and told me to use shoe arch support. Now my problem is cured without surgery. Extremely thankful to sir for his treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Oh my God such a nice human being, down to earth person,never seen such respect from a doctor, I am very young compare to doctors age but he started calling me sir as I was addressing him sir, I was shocked and stunned for the doctor mutual respect and about treatment again he is the first the doctor to look all the MRI films with patience like not just looking for the sake of patient (it was nearly 12) and explained the issue and the treatment and I am so happy about the visit and I gained confidence that I can recover completely by follwing the doctor advise. Thank you Sir.

tags: Wait time,
review: It's the 2nd time we took doctor's appointment but somehow after waiting for good 90 minutes we had to get back as the doctor was taking too long to see the patient. Last time we took Dr Natraj appointment but got consultation from other doctor.  I understand that he is proficient in his work *** *** ************ ** *** ****** **** *********** ******* *** *********** Don't go to Belenus to visit him rather go to some other doctor who respects your time and respond to your problem.
reply_text:
Dear sir, 
Really appreciate your feedback, this helps us to improve our services. I will explain what happened that day.  When you visited the hospital, during that time 12 patients registered in an internal of 45min ( ideally 3 patients can be seen in 45 min). Its not a mistake of hospital or doctor when more patients register at a time(some are late for the their appointments, some are early, some are emergencies). So the back log continued. That day I continued seeing patients without taking lunch break so that I can clear all the waiting patients. I was pretty much sitting in my cabin and seeing patients without stepping out. No appointments were cancelled but got delayed due to the rush. 
Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:

I don‚Äôt have enough words  to say anything but yes I‚Äôll never forget him. God bless him. Thanks üôèüèª

Dr Nataraj is very friendly and amicable.  He listens to the patient and tried to find correct solution and explains the same to patient 
He even responds on phone call for follow up 
He does not scare the patient or recommend unnecessary treatments

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Our daughter was suffering from severe neck pain. We consulted many doctors but situation was worsening day by day. First of all this doctor spent considerable time with us. He really advised us in a detailed manner and because of his advice, our daughter could recovered well. He treated us like a family member. We are thankful to you Sir. I pray many more patients recover 100% by you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: We took Dr Nataraj's services for rotator cuff tear repair via arthroscopy surgery for my father. ** ******* *** ******* **** **** ** ********* ***** *** ************ ** ****** *** ****** *********, we needed expert doctor for the surgery.  ** ** *** ** *** **** ************ ******* ** **********  He is very empathetic, and has a superb team for arthroscopic surgery requiring very high skills. He is very responsive, and very cool headed. He explains to every small or big query with lot of patience.  Doctor himself came on round several times post surgery, and his staff also kept on visiting to ensure speedy recovery during the hospitalisation.
Issue not resolved I still have swelling and pain. I think doctor needs to spend more time in diagnosis

**** ******* Clear explanation and treatment.
Clear instructions on how to recover.  Follow up sessions and offered Physio support from hospital.

Dr natraj is a great doctor.. visited for my mother's  joint problems.. he's very understanding and listen to ur problem.i highly recommend him to anyone looking for a specialist..

I would like to recommend dr.Nataraj sir and good human being he understand patient pain and treat and I am satisfied

I m consultanting doctor natraj from past 4 years for all ortho related issues, he is very humble and explain each and every thing very clearly with patience, suggests **** treatment

review: went for back pain. he calmly listens me and then explain me that it's a muscle pull. he clearly said that u will get complete relief in 15-20days. prescribed medicine only for 5 days. I got complete relief. definitely recommend him .
Dr. Natraj referred to as knee God is a super human being and a wonderful doctor. He has always explained the issue in details and helps you to recover within min cost.
I would recommend Dr Natarajan.He is approachable and can explain the issue and take adequate steps immediately.

**** ******* listen issue peacefully and given solution to it.

What i like is less medication and no non necessary lab tests.
reply_text:
Thank you very much for the feedback.
Regards,
Dr Nataraj H M
HOD orthopaedics
Robotic joint replacement surgeon 
Sports surgeon specialised in ACL reconstruction, meniscus repair, shoulder dislocation surgeries, rotator cuff repair, arthroscopy and fracture surgeries.
